original_title: That Sitcom Show 8: I Love the 80s
overview: Jack has already banged Crissy and Janet, but he's so horny that he can't resist the chance to fuck them and their friend! Willis has won a trip to Blair's bedroom but she's totally clothes and playing hard to get...at least in the beginning! Jack has to pretend to be gay to live with the girls but the temptation to fuck is just too much for all three of them! Dad's talk with Beaver about the birds and the bees doesn't go so well but luckily Emily explains things much better!
title: That Sitcom Show 8: I Love the 80s
